LanguageData.Apparello_GSkin.label: Комбинезон
LanguageData.Apparello_GSkin.description: A basic Jumpsuit. Normally seen worn on Glitterworld light infantry and officials and especially firefighters for it's heat absorbing properties
LanguageData.Apparello_XcomOne.label: Спецодежда
LanguageData.Apparello_XcomOne.description: Spaceship engineers all across the galaxy are known to wear these for the resistance they provide against their worst enemy: The electric cables.
LanguageData.Apparello_Standissue.label: стандартный выпуск спецодежды
LanguageData.Apparello_Standissue.description: Standard military issue air force overalls. Very common amongst orbital drop squads
LanguageData.Apparello_MedicalApron.label: фартук хирурга
LanguageData.Apparello_MedicalApron.description: Lovely plastic apron for all your bloodspilling needs.
LanguageData.Apparello_Smithaprontosaurus.label: нагрудный фартук
LanguageData.Apparello_Smithaprontosaurus.description: These kind of hardened leather aprons are used by professionals of many trades.
LanguageData.Apparello_Cookaprontosaurus.label: фартук
LanguageData.Apparello_Cookaprontosaurus.description: Pocketed cloth apron intended for enhancing your housekeeping experience. It's a hygiene thing, you wouldn't understand.
LanguageData.Apparello_Trypophobia.label: пальто торговца
LanguageData.Apparello_Trypophobia.description: "What is a trader? A miserable little pile of bags" -Count Dravania, moments before being lynched by an angry mob.
LanguageData.Apparello_PonPon.label: пончо
LanguageData.Apparello_PonPon.description: Gunslinger's second best friend, Right after the sixshooter and Ten-Gallon Stetson! No, wait make that the third best.
LanguageData.Apparello_Longlylonglong.label: длинное пальто
LanguageData.Apparello_Skull.label: рейдерская куртка
LanguageData.Apparello_Skull.description: Your basic jacket modified with crude shoulderpads and spikes.
LanguageData.Apparello_Preston.label: верхняя униформа
LanguageData.Apparello_Preston.description: Captain's uniform jacket. Gives the wearer very commanding presence. Most often seen on Starfleet admirals. Commanders wearing garments like these would only need to say "Make it so" and all the tachyon colliders would be rerouted to the shields to withstand the devastating blast no other ships could even hope to survive
LanguageData.Apparello_Brocade.label: парчовый жилет
LanguageData.Apparello_Brocade.description: Always keep calm and collected. And wear brocade. The definite go to piece of apparel for any gentleguy or gal
LanguageData.Apparello_Urbulence.label: сетчатая рубашка
LanguageData.Apparello_Urbulence.description: All the punks felt lucky wearing these.
